translation.en: [woman on intercom] Dr. Weissler report to delivery.
translation.zh: 韦斯勒医生请到产房报到

translation.en: [Elle Evans] Look at that cute baby! That's me, Elle Evans.
translation.zh:
看这可爱的婴儿
这是我艾莉依云丝

translation.en: And the smelly, less-cute baby right next to me? That's my best friend Lee.
translation.zh:
我旁边这个没那么可爱的
就是我的好友李尔

translation.en: Lee and I were born on the same day, at the same time,
translation.zh: 李尔和我同日同时出生

translation.en: Our moms were BFFs before people even used the term "BFF,"
translation.zh:
我们的母亲是闺蜜
感情像鲜花而不是塑胶花

translation.en: so we were raised like twins
and we've been pretty much inseparable ever since.
I don't remember a lot from before high school,
but for as long as I can remember,
Anyway a lot of stuff has happened between now and then.
Let me get you up to speed. First Christmas I remember, I was six.
translation.zh:
我加快点速度
6岁那年的圣诞节

translation.en: I got a Barbie dance party. Lee got a scooter.
translation.zh:
我得到芭比舞会娃娃
李尔得到滑板车

translation.en: Broke my leg riding Lee's scooter.
translation.zh: 我玩滑板车的时候断了腿

translation.en: Had my cast signed by Lee, who bought me ice cream to make up for breaking my leg.
translation.zh:
李尔在我的断腿上签字留念
还给我买雪糕作为补偿

translation.en: Dressed as a cowboy for Halloween, Lee went as a doctor.
translation.zh:
万圣节的时候换装牛仔
李尔则是医生

translation.en: Learned how to ride a bike, learned how to swim.
translation.zh: 学习骑单车 学习游泳

translation.en: Got protected by Lee's older brother Noah,
translation.zh: 被李尔的大哥诺亚保护

translation.en: who chased off some bullies who were hassling us.
translation.zh: 把骚扰我们的坏孩子赶走

translation.en: Had to pay protection tax, though.
Discovered the place that we loved to dance most.
translation.zh: 发现了我们最爱跳舞的地方

translation.en: ♪ Rip it up Forget about your school work ♪ ♪ Rip it up, yeah ♪
[Elle] Watched Lee catch his first fish.
Watched Noah in his first fight. He won.
translation.zh: 看着诺亚第一次打架 还赢了

translation.en: Dressed as a fireman for Halloween.
Lee went as some weird bird.
Found out that my mom was sick.
Went to visit her in the hospital for the first time.
Tried to get used to seeing her there.
Got in a fight with Lee over who's the best dancer.
translation.zh:
为了谁跳得更好
和李尔打架

translation.en: Made up by getting him ice cream.
translation.zh: 买雪糕给他来修复关系

translation.en: Got in a fight with Noah for beating up Lee.
translation.zh: 因为诺亚打李尔挺身而出

translation.en: Made up with Noah by letting him fix my bike.
Got my first bra. Didn't really need it.
translation.zh: 我的第一个胸罩 其实还不需要

translation.en: Discovered a way to get to our favorite place to dance.
translation.zh: 发现去跳舞地点的最佳路径

translation.en: ♪Says she wanna dance to a different groove ♪ ♪ Now you know what to do G bust a move ♪
Discovered that I wasn't gonna be a fashion icon.
translation.zh: 明白我没有什么潮流细胞

translation.en: Discovered I am good at sports.
Had a tough talk with Dad.
Sat with mom in the hospital.
I tried to help her put makeup on.
[Elle] Held her hand a long time.
Only cried when she was asleep.
Tried to score my first kiss with Randy Melrose.
translation.zh: 打算将初吻给兰迪梅洛斯

translation.en: Watched Noah getting really, really cute!
Watched Noah in yet another fight. He won.
Went as a pirate for Halloween.
Watched Noah ride his motorcycle for the first time.
translation.zh: 看诺亚第一次骑摩托车

translation.en: Watched Lee try to ride Noah's motorcycle.
translation.zh: 看李尔尝试骑诺亚的摩托车

translation.en: Watched Noah teach Lee a lesson for sitting on his motorcycle.
Celebrated with Lee when he got his dream car.
translation.zh: （16岁） 和李尔一起庆祝他获得自己的爱车

translation.en: Learned that girls can be really mean.
Played Seven Minutes in Heaven. Fail!
translation.zh: 打算尝试亲亲 又失败！

translation.en: Got a bra I suddenly did need!
Wondered why I still hadn't been kissed yet or even been on a date.
translation.zh:
想知道自己为何没人约
初吻竟然送不出去

translation.en: Realized I had a crush on Noah.
Got over my crush on Noah...
savoring the last fleeting moments of summer at Lee's totally awesome house.
translation.zh:
在李尔的豪宅
享受夏天最后的好时光

translation.en: It's moments like this that make me wish things could stay this way forever.
translation.zh:
这样的时候
我总希望不要结束

translation.en: Hey, Lee, guess what Warren texted the entire school!
translation.zh:
李尔 你知不知道
沃伦发错短信给整个学校

translation.en: Oh, my God! That was a good one!
Here, come here, take a seat.
So, tomorrow, first day of school,
translation.zh: 明天 上学的第一天

translation.en: the student council is expecting our dance club idea
translation.zh: 学生会需要我们舞蹈社在本周

translation.en: this week for the fall fundraiser.
translation.zh: 拿出秋天筹款嘉年华的创意

translation.en: We're gonna be in trouble if we don't come up with something fast.
translation.zh: 我们要赶紧想 不然就麻烦了

translation.en: but Lee and I developed a list of friendship rules.
Lee was responsible for Rule Number Nine,
which specifically states, "relatives of your best friend
translation.zh: 特别指明了好友的亲属

translation.en: This is a really big one for Lee.
I guess it comes from living in the shadow of a high school legend.
translation.zh:
我想因为他生活在
高中传奇的阴影之下

translation.en: Lee, you seen my athletic cup?
translation.zh: 李尔 你看到我的护具吗？

translation.en: I needed it for all those varsity sports I'm constantly playing, you know?
translation.zh: 我在学校运动队需要那东西

translation.en: [Elle] He knows I hate being called Shelly.
translation.zh: 他知道我讨厌被人叫雪莉

translation.en: I know he hates being called Noah.
translation.zh: 我知道他也不喜欢这个发音

translation.en: When did you get the boobs?
When you were at football camp learning to be a better douche.
translation.zh: 你在足球训练营碌碌无为的时候

translation.en: It was almost like she was on human growth hormones or something.
translation.zh: 她开始有点荷尔蒙正常反应

translation.en: Rule Number Two: Never share our secrets with anyone else.
translation.zh: 第2条 彼此间的秘密不能告知第三者

translation.en: Whatever. Listen. M and D are out of town Friday night,so party starts at eight.
translation.zh:
听着 爸妈周五晚出城
派对8点开始

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey! Rule Number Nine, young lady!
Yeah, well, you got a little bit of drool on the corner of your mouth.
Oh, no! Are you kidding me?
Hey, Dad, where are my other pairs of school pants?
translation.zh: 爸 我另一条校裤在哪里？

translation.en: Ninth grade skirt on eleventh grade body.
Dad, my pants ripped. This is literally all I had.
translation.zh: 我的裤子破了 我只有这个

translation.en: Okay, I suppose I could swing by the cleaners,
translation.zh: 这样 我可以洗好裤子

translation.en: Oh, my God, that would be amazing!
-I love you more! -Bye! I love you!
-You should have back-ups. -My backups are at the cleaners.
-What about your back-up back-ups? -These are my back-up back-ups!
Okay, I'm trying. Seriously though, cover up.
translation.zh:
好好 现在走
真的 你还是盖一下

translation.en: -Like, I'm trying to drive. -[Elle] Stop! You're so stupid!
translation.zh:
-别影响我开车
-你这笨蛋别这样

translation.en: Well, if you got your driver's license,
you wouldn't have to put up with my driving.
Okay, but why would I do that when I have you as my personal chauffeur?
translation.zh: 有免费司机 我干嘛还自己开车
要想到筹款嘉年华的创意

translation.en: Hey, man, is that girl new?
Yo! I think that's Elle Evans!
Allow me to revise. Everyone is looking at you.
translation.zh: 不对 大家都在看你

translation.en: Elle, you are aware that your lady shape sort of changed over the summer, right?
translation.zh: 你要明白你夏天开始发育了

translation.en: This was the moment that happens to all of us
when you suddenly go from invisible to everyone staring at you.
translation.zh: 你忽然从小人物变成全场焦点

translation.en: -What the hell, Tuppen? -It's fine, Lee. I got this.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事 塔宾？
-没事 李尔

translation.en: How about I relax your face?
Lee, it's fine! I got this! Lee!
I did not think that through.
Enough, Noah! Stop! Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 够了 诺亚 你疯了吗？

translation.en: Now you three, in my office!
He even gets credit for my fights!
Any excuse for a fight, right?
And besides, no one should treat a girl like that.
translation.zh: 另外 不应该这样对女孩子

translation.en: Especially if that girl is you.
Yeah. It's like those guys are trying to get in my little sister's pants,
translation.zh:
我把你看作我妹
他们对你的小内内动手

translation.en: [Elle] Never great to hear your childhood crush say it's super gross in your pants.
translation.zh:
听到曾经的梦中情人说
小内内什么的 真不好

translation.en: You know, you have zero experience with guys.
You've never even had a boyfriend.
Wearing a skirt like that is asking for it.
translation.zh:
穿这么短的裙子
就像要求欢

translation.en: You want to go down that road?
I kind of just played the whole sexist conversation out in my head
translation.zh: 每次说起这种和性有关的话题

translation.en: and it always ended with me sounding like a dick.
-My pants ripped! It's all I had. -What about your back-ups?
translation.zh:
-我只有这条可以穿
-你替换的呢？

translation.en: -These are my back-up back-ups! -All right! Don't get so upset!
translation.zh:
-就是这条！
-好的 不要激动

translation.en: I am upset. Dude touched my lady-bump.
translation.zh: 我是激动 我被人摸了屁屁

translation.en: And Mr. Tuppen will be punished,
but I also, unfortunately, must punish you.
-Oh, my God! Am I being expelled? -Elle...
translation.zh:
-我的天 你要把我开除吗？
-艾莉

translation.en: I've never been in trouble before. I feel like it's hot in here. I'm sweating.
translation.zh:
我之前没犯过错 这里很热
我在出汗

translation.en: You only broke the dress code.
translation.zh: 你只是违反了校服规定

translation.en: Have you made out with him yet?
[Elle] These three super-popular juniors are kind of package deal.
translation.zh:
这3个学校里的流行人物
真的是物以类聚

translation.en: I call them the OMG Girls.

translation.zh: 奥丽薇拉 米娅和格温內

translation.en: And I have no idea why they're sitting with me.
translation.zh: 我不知道她们靠近我做什么

translation.en: I would totally have babies with Noah.
translation.zh: 我不介意跟诺亚生孩子
一个女孩 一个男孩

translation.en: But not at the same time though.
Yeah, you don't really get to pick the gender so much.
I hear he's into blondes. Too bad, Elle.
translation.zh: 听说他喜欢金发的 真可惜

translation.en: Give me your numerals. We should def catch up.
translation.zh: 给我你的号码 我们多联系

translation.en: There's a shemergency in the locker room.
translation.zh: 更衣室那边有些经急意外

translation.en: Sorry it didn't work out with you and Noah.
Guess it wasn't meant to be.
[Elle] What just happened? And why were the OMG Girls being so nice to me?
translation.zh:
怎么回事 “要你命”女孩
这么好说话的？

translation.en: But more importantly, when did they eat those?
translation.zh: 更奇怪的是 她们什么时候吃的？

translation.en: She say anything about me? You tell her about my dimples?
translation.zh:
她有提起我吗？
你有否帮我美言？

translation.en: What did she smell like today?
Sometimes she smells like apples or kind of like blueberry-coconut fusion.
translation.zh:
有时她闻起来像苹果
有时是蓝莓或者椰子之类的

translation.en: I am trying to find a good idea for our carnival fundraiser.
translation.zh: 我在为筹款嘉年华想创意

translation.en: What about the strength game, the one with the sledgehammer and the bell?
translation.zh: 那个游戏 有大锤和响铃的如何？

translation.en: Yeah, the chess team picked that one. I know.
[Lee] What about... Ooh! What about a dunking booth?
I know, dude! Who saw that one coming?
translation.zh: 我知道 但谁事先想到呢？

translation.en: Okay, do you think Mia would like this one?
translation.zh: 你觉得米娅会喜欢这个吗？

translation.en: Because I think it makes my eyes pop, and I really want to kiss her on Friday.
translation.zh:
我觉得这个会让我眼神迷人
周五我很想吻她

translation.en: Come on! Today was the first time the OMGs ever spoke to me.
translation.zh:
算了吧 今天是“要你命”女孩
第一次和我说话

translation.en: Do you really think Mia knows who you are?
translation.zh: 你以为米娅知道你是谁？

translation.en: Lee, come on. She's a varsity cheerleader.
translation.zh: 李尔 算了吧 她是啦啦队的

translation.en: Basically, the only way she'd ever make out with you is if you paid for it.
translation.zh: 基本上 你唯一的机会就是付钱

translation.en: Oh, that is the perfect carnival fundraiser!
translation.zh: 这个在筹款嘉年华上搞最好了

translation.en: I love the irony. The girl who's never been kissed does a kissing booth? What?
translation.zh:
这很有讽刺意味
还有初吻的你提出这个创意

translation.en: Yes, irony is a cruel mistress indeed.
translation.zh: 讽刺是个严苛的女主人

translation.en: Okay, well, now all we need is the student council to approve it.
translation.zh: 接下来只需要学生会同意就好了

translation.en: Yes. Don't worry. Leave that to me.
I can't believe you actually gave him your number.
translation.zh: 我没想到你竟然把号码给他了

translation.en: Well, it was a really nice apology.
Plus, that whole skirt thing was priceless!
translation.zh: 整个裙子的事情也很无聊

translation.en: If word gets out that fighting me is a way of getting your number,
translation.zh:
如果传出去
跟我打架能拿到你的号码

translation.en: I am in for a super long junior year.
translation.zh: 那我接下来日子怎么过

translation.en: Oh, I wouldn't really call it a fight.
I think I'm gonna go out with Tuppen.
-Unless you think I shouldn't. -No, actually, I think you should.
You're gonna have to go on a date eventually.
translation.zh: 你始终要和别人约会的

translation.en: God, what do people even do on dates?
I don't know. Sit around and eat food, I guess.
translation.zh:
我不知道
坐在一起吃东西吧

translation.en: My heart is beating so fast.
Okay, listen. Can you just keep your phone on you?
Because I know myself and I'm gonna run out of things to talk about
-and I really want to call you-- -No.
-I know myself. -No! Do not call me.
translation.zh:
-我不善言语
-不 别打给我

translation.en: Okay? If he can't see how completely baller you are,
translation.zh: 如果他看不到你的好处

translation.en: Then he's not the right guy for you.
Oh! You can be so sweet when you want to be.

translation.zh:
-好的 谢谢送我一程
-没问题

translation.en: [Lee] Have a good time! But not too good of a time!
translation.zh: 玩得开心 但别太过分了

translation.en: [Elle] God! What is wrong with me?
Am I some sort of freak or something?
translation.zh: 我是不是看起来不太正常？

translation.en: Tuppen is just a dick. I don't know why I told you to go out with him.
translation.zh:
塔宾是个混蛋
我不应该叫你和他约会

translation.en: Maybe because he's the only guy that's ever asked me out.
translation.zh: 大概是因为他是唯一约我的

translation.en: Stop it, all right? Tuppen isn't worth it.
translation.zh: 别这样好吗？塔宾不值得

translation.en: You're way too good for him.
Plus I heard he's got like, three nipples.
translation.zh: 而且我听说他有3个奶头

translation.en: Thanks for doing this for me.
Are you kidding me? I live for this shit.
translation.zh: 你太客气了 我就擅长这个

translation.en: You had your shot. Keep on moving, bud.
translation.zh: 你已经试过了 快走开吧

translation.en: I need to talk to Elle.
running a bit late now, are we?
Look. I'm sorry I stood you up.
I really did want to go out with you.
I just thought you deserve a little bit of an explanation.
told me that it wouldn't be smart if I showed up for our date tonight.
translation.zh:
跟我说如果我今晚出现
后果自负

translation.en: It's true, and it's not just me.
He's been going around telling all the guys not to ask you out
translation.zh: 他跟大家说 不准约你出去

translation.en: You can't tell him I told you.
No boobs are worth a broken nose.
translation.zh: 你的胸不值得我被打一顿

translation.en: But just so you know, my boobs are fantastic!
translation.zh: 你要知道 我的胸棒得很！

translation.en: Yes, some would even say breathtaking!
translation.zh: 有人说 那叫波涛汹涌！

translation.en: You do realize that you're not my dad, right?
Look, you still got a lot to learn, kiddo.
translation.zh: 你还有很多要学 孩子

translation.en: Oh, if you were here, I would beat you with my shoe,
translation.zh: 如果你在我面前 我就狠抽你

translation.en: And that's why I know he's wrong for you.
translation.zh: 所以我知道他跟你不合适

translation.en: Well, today is not that day.
It is not your job to monitor my dating life. Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 你没权利控制我跟谁约会 懂吗？

translation.en: The days of you controlling my life are over!
[British Beauty] Next proposal is from the dance club.
translation.zh: 下一个提案来自舞蹈社
艾莉依云丝和李尔弗林

translation.en: Sorry. I thought that was gonna be funnier.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我觉得那很可爱

translation.en: And what is your idea for the fundraiser?
translation.zh: 你对筹款嘉年华有什么想法？

translation.en: We have an idea that we think everyone will be very excited about.
translation.zh:
我们有个想法
相信大家都会感到兴奋的

translation.en: But first, we want to thank you for your time
translation.zh: 首先 我们想感谢大家抽空

translation.en: and ask that you withold any...
Yeah, we want to do a kissing booth.
translation.zh: 是的 我们想做亲吻角落

translation.en: Okay, I think I speak for everyone
when I say kissing is the number one cause
Uh, it would be totally voluntary.
And no tongue, because we're not the French.
translation.zh: 而且不是舌吻 我们不是法国人
我是英国人 你这笨蛋

translation.en: -but would you be working the booth? -Me?
But I can assure you, we have some real A-listers lined up.
translation.zh:
但我可以保证
我们有很多优秀的候选人

translation.en: Would Flynn be working the kissing booth?
[Lee] You'd have a better chance getting Miley Cyrus to become a nun...
translation.zh: 我估计你见到麦莉希拉机会更大…

translation.en: Absolutely! No, Flynn will be working the booth.
I promise. Flynn will be there.
translation.zh: 我保证 弗林一定在场

translation.en: [Elle] You're about to witness a family tradition.
For as long as I can remember,
we've had lunch with the Flynns every Sunday.
translation.zh: 我们每周日都和弗林一家聚餐

translation.en: She's sort of a surrogate mom to me.
I couldn't have made it through the years without her.
translation.zh: 这些年多亏有她陪伴我

translation.en: I don't know what that means, but I want to hear all the gory details later.
translation.zh:
虽然不知道什么意思
但你慢慢跟我说

translation.en: -[Flynn] And how's my favorite little man? -I'm okay.
Hey, Noah! I haven't seen you since you got back from football camp.
translation.zh:
诺亚 从足球训练营回来后
我就没见过你了

translation.en: Well... he'll be lucky if he makes it through the season.
translation.zh:
他如果可以打一个赛季
就算运气好

translation.en: He goes and gets into a fight on the first day of school.
translation.zh: 他第一天回校就打架了

translation.en: It was just an argument over something that happened at football camp.
translation.zh: 只是足球训练营的一些争吵

translation.en: [Elle] Wonder why he didn't say anything.
Our booth is going to kick ass at the carnival.
translation.zh: 这个角落肯定是最亮眼的

translation.en: Mia stopped me in the hall and said that she's going to the party tonight.
translation.zh: 米娅截停我 说今晚她会去派对

translation.en: She wanted to make sure that I would be there.
Well, sir, I wish you the best of luck with that.
Oh, I have to go to practice right now.
Can you still give me a ride afterwards?
Oh, I can't. I'm taking my parents to the airport.
translation.zh: 不行 我要送父母去机场

translation.en: But Noah can give you a ride.
Convince him to do the booth.
You're gonna have to ask him eventually.
[Noah] We're having a party at my place tonight if you guys want to come.
translation.zh: 我家今晚有派对 欢迎你们来

translation.en: My parents aren't going to be home, so there's gonna be drinks.
translation.zh: 我父母不在 大家可以畅饮

translation.en: -My brother will be there, but you know. -Hey.
Lee said that you're gonna give me a ride.
Look, I have a spare helmet. You'll be fine.
translation.zh:
我还有一副头盔
你很安全

translation.en: I'm not gonna get on that thing like one of your make-out girls.
translation.zh:
我不会坐摩托车
那让我像是你的妞

translation.en: They don't all make out with me.
translation.zh: 坐我车不代表是那种关系

translation.en: 95% of them make out with me, but that is clearly not what's happening here,
translation.zh: 可能95%的都是 但你不是就好了

translation.en: so if you could just get on the damned bike please.
translation.zh: 请你坐上那摩托车好吗？

translation.en: It's so beautiful outside, I think I'm gonna go for a run.
translation.zh: 外面风景很好 我想可以跑一段

translation.en: -Are you serious? It's like five miles. -What?
-Are you serious? -I'm sorry. Can't hear you.
translation.zh:
-你认真的吗？
-抱歉 我听不见

translation.en: I'll see you at the party, okay?
No, you won't. I told you not to come.
translation.zh: 不 我说了你不要来

translation.en: See? I knew that you could hear me.
Need peeps to work our kissing booth. You in?
translation.zh: 需要亲吻角落的台主 你来吗？

translation.en: No thanks. I'd rather be a customer.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢 我宁愿做顾客

translation.en: -Not in this lifetime, girl! -Never gonna happen.
So nobody wants to work the booth.
Getting those A-listers may be harder than I thought.
translation.zh: 说服那些人比我想象的难

translation.en: We need to up our game. I really want to pull this off.
translation.zh:
要想想办法
我真的很想搞成此事

translation.en: You see? I told you she'd come.

translation.zh: 嘿 艾莉 快过来

translation.en: The OMGs want to talk to me twice in one week!
translation.zh: “要你命”女孩居然热情打招呼

translation.en: Oh, and tell Mia I'm awesome.
Oh, no, I really don't drink.
Wow! That does taste like green!
So have you asked him yet?
The OMG Girls want to know if you'll do our kissing booth.
translation.zh:
“要你命”女孩想知道
你会否参加亲吻角落

translation.en: Okay, you win, Noah. You want me to wash your motorcycle?
translation.zh:
你赢了 诺亚
我帮你洗摩托车

translation.en: Did you just put hands on me?

translation.zh: 去玩你的过家家吧 贱人

translation.en: She's like important to my family, which kind of makes her important to me.
translation.zh:
她对我的家人很重要
所以 她对我很重要

translation.en: Uh, sorry I ruined your make-out sesh.
Oh, it's fine. She kind of tasted like Cheetos anyway.
translation.zh: 没事 她闻起来像奇多

translation.en: Oh, my God! That was so savage!
translation.zh: 我的天 这太粗野了

translation.en: So, Flynn's still doing the booth?
Noah Flynn basically does whatever I tell him.
translation.zh: 诺亚弗林是不会拒绝我的

translation.en: Oh, yeah! That's right! That's what happens when you mess with me.
translation.zh: 就是这样 你挑战我就这个下场

translation.en: You're holding it completely wrong. Just--
Warren! Can you just play the game? I know how to hold a controller.
translation.zh:
沃伦 你能不能好好玩游戏
我知道什么姿势

translation.en: -Oh, yes! Come on! You got it! -Boring!
translation.zh:
-对了 来吧 就这样！
-太无聊了

translation.en: Holy shit, bro! Check it out.
translation.zh: 靠 兄弟 看那边

translation.en: -I bet you she does. I bet you. -No.
Who is this? Are you-- are you a girl princess or a boy princess?
translation.zh: 这是谁 你是女公主还是男公主？

translation.en: Dress is missing but underwear is still on.
translation.zh: 衣服不见了 但内裤还在

translation.en: Okay. We can work with that.
I didn't mean to wake you. I was just grabbing some clothes.
translation.zh: 我没想吵醒你 我找衣服

translation.en: You were about to strip on the pool table in front of a bunch of guys
translation.zh:
你在桌子上当着众人
大跳脱衣舞

translation.en: I carried you out before too much came off.
translation.zh: 在你脱光之前 我把你抬走

translation.en: Oh, and you threw up on your dress.
It's okay. But I mean, this is exactly what I was talking about, Shelly.
translation.zh: 没事 但这就是我想说的

translation.en: Oh, I hope I didn't snore.
I slept in the guest room.
I am assuming the t-shirt means you saw me in my underwear?
translation.zh: 这件衣服 那说明你看到了我的内衣

translation.en: Okay, well my arm is caught! Let me just reach down and...
translation.zh:
好的 你压住我的手
让我自己来

translation.en: Oh, my God! I just touched it!

translation.zh:
-你的衣服 好的 抱歉
-艾莉

translation.en: It's okay. I got it covered.
Made you an emergency survival kit.
translation.zh: 我帮你准备了急救套装

translation.en: Some granola, sports drinks, antacids, and an epic dose of awkward shame!
translation.zh:
即食麦片 运动饮料 抗酸灵
还有消除尴尬的灵药

translation.en: Oh, and... really good work last night.
You told everybody that Noah and the OMGs
would be doing the kissing booth.
translation.zh: “要你命”女孩会参加亲吻角落

translation.en: And even though I felt like I was about to puke my liver out,
translation.zh: 在我感觉想吐想死的时候

translation.en: I couldn't stop thinking about Noah.
It seemed like he just saw me as a little sister,
translation.zh: 看起来他把我当小妹妹

translation.en: but I couldn't help wondering if he had a different reason for protecting me.
translation.zh:
但我忍不住想
他会不会有别的理由来保护我

translation.en: Listen, it's all about the OMGs.
translation.zh: 听着 关于“要你命”女孩

translation.en: We get them to do the booth, everyone else will follow.
translation.zh: 只要她们加入 其他人都会跟随

translation.en: -Do you want to go over the plan again? -No, I think I got it.
translation.zh:
-你是想再试一次原计划吗？
-不是 我有想法了

translation.en: Have you guys seen this text?
Why are you standing and talking instead of sitting and talking?
translation.zh: 你为何站着说话 不坐下来？

translation.en: -Lee wants to know if you like him. -Flynn's brother?
translation.zh:
-李尔想知道你是否喜欢他
-弗林的弟弟？

translation.en: Yeah, he's cute. Needs to learn to dress, though.
translation.zh: 他很可爱 但着装还要改善

translation.en: everything's set for the kissing booth, right?
translation.zh: 我们现在要先安排亲吻角落的事

translation.en: Okay, so here's what I just heard.
Flynn likes one of you. Yeah.
translation.zh: 弗林喜欢你们中的一个

translation.en: And rumor has it that if the person he likes is working the booth,
translation.zh: 传闻说如果那个人参加

translation.en: we would totally do the kissing booth, girl. Just for you.
translation.zh:
我们都会为了你
参加那个亲吻角落的

translation.en: [Elle] So we've got a pretty solid line up now,
but we're still down one Noah Flynn, though.
But let's focus on the booth.
I'm going to make the letters,
and then you are going to make everything else. Okay?
translation.zh: 你负责其他的 好吗？

translation.en: We're only two days away from the carnival so we need to move. Chop-chop!
translation.zh: 离嘉年华只剩2天 我们要赶紧

translation.en: Have I ever told you that you're bossy?
translation.zh: 我有没有说过 你很喜欢指使人

translation.en: Yes, but then I told you not to tell me that anymore.
translation.zh: 有 然后我叫你不要再提

-你真搞笑
-我觉得幽默准确点

translation.en: -I'm more of a slapstick guy myself. -Really?
I am sorry. Was that the wrong color?
translation.zh: 抱歉 这颜色是否不对？

translation.en: Holy shit! She looks like a hot Braveheart!
translation.zh:
靠 她看起来是
勇敢的心的女装版

translation.en: I told you before, stop messing around.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 别捣蛋

translation.en: I'll leave when I want to!
You're not the boss of me, Noah.
Come on, let's just go, huh?
translation.zh: 来吧 你先离开好吗？

translation.en: Now put your shirt on and get out.
[Elle] What he said made sense. It also meant he cared.
translation.zh: 他说的有道理 他关心我

translation.en: But what came out of my mouth was...
I told you to stop telling me what to do.
translation.zh: 我叫你不要对我指手画脚

translation.en: ♪ Surf the mountain, ride the crest ♪
♪ I've been looking in a new direction ♪
I know that we don't really see eye-to-eye on things,
translation.zh: 我明白我们经常观点不同

translation.en: So maybe if you could just stop by the booth for a little.
translation.zh: 如果你可以在角落呆一段时间

translation.en: It would mean a lot to me.
who doesn't want to be told what to do by anyone,
is begging somebody else for help.
It is what it is, Noah.
I mean, I just really thought that maybe it would be nice for you to do something
translation.zh:
我只是想 也许你可以
为了关心你的人

translation.en: for people that care about you.
Step right up, ladies and gentlemen!
translation.zh: 各位俊男美女 请注意

translation.en: Come one, come all, behold the power and raw intensity of a kiss
translation.zh:
来吧 来感受亲吻
带来的冲击和情感

translation.en: from one of our beautiful people!
A ticket and a mint, which we encourage each and every single one of you to use!
translation.zh:
只要购票和口气清新
每个人都可以尝试

translation.en: All sales and epic smooches are final!
translation.zh: 就可以收获动魄惊心的吻

translation.en: As you may have noticed, there's a slight twist to this kissing booth.
translation.zh:
然后你们也看到了
这个角落还有点特别

translation.en: The people you will be kissing are blindfolded!
translation.zh: 你们要亲吻的对象 是蒙眼的
你们的对象是美艳的奥丽薇拉
好了 欢迎大家参加

translation.en: -I'll take that. -Thank you! A great smootch!
Okay, give this guy two mints.
But we do have one problem.
The girls are asking for Flynn,
translation.zh: 那些女孩都是等弗林的

translation.en: As promised, the next kisser is Flynn!
translation.zh: 万众期待的 下一个就是弗林

translation.en: Hold on. That is not Flynn.
The only reason I ever talked to that dork
was to make sure he'd get his brother to come to the booth tonight.
translation.zh: 只为了确保他大哥能参加活动

translation.en: I hope you like what you see.
So, we're gonna hang out now.
Oh, but there's another hour left.
Just don't do anything I wouldn't do.
[Elle] Rule number 18: always be happy for your bestie's successes.
translation.zh: 第18条 永远祝福对方

translation.en: For me, that one has always been easy to follow.
translation.zh: 这一条我是很容易就做到了

translation.en: I can't do it! Not with him!
translation.zh: 我接受不了 那个不行

translation.en: -Gross. -It's payback time for lying about Flynn.

translation.zh:
-谁？谁在外面？
-奥丽薇拉的前任

translation.en: And the problem is we're all really good friends.
translation.zh: 问题是 我们是好朋友

translation.en: you don't know Olivia's ex at all, do you?
translation.zh: 你不认识奥丽薇拉的前任吧

translation.en: Oh, no, Mia, please! I don't think this is a good idea.
translation.zh:
不 米娅
我觉得这样不好

translation.en: -[Elle] No, Mia! -[Mia] Time to get your dirty-girl on!
Sorry. I know that you were
translation.zh: 抱歉 我知道你要奥丽薇拉

translation.en: probably expecting Olivia, so we don't have to do anything if you don't want to.
translation.zh: 如果你不想 我们可以什么都不做

translation.en: Truth be told, I've never kissed anyone before.
translation.zh: 老实说 我没吻过别人

translation.en: [Elle] It's not that I haven't wanted to, don't get me wrong.
translation.zh: 不是我不想 别误会

translation.en: For example, I punched Ron Getler
in the sixth grade during Seven Minutes in Heaven.
translation.zh: 我和朗基勒撞在了一起
高中二年级 舞会上

translation.en: I was dancing with Randy Melrose.
You know, a romantic song came on.
I was like, "Oh ,it's gonna happen!" But... until...
translation.zh:
我心想 就要发生了
直到…

translation.en: Everyone-- everyone just saw that, didn't they?
Oh, my God! Kill me now!
Come on. Relax, Shelly. It was just a kiss.
translation.zh:
放松点 雪莉
这只是个吻

translation.en: [Elle] Was it, Noah? Was it just a kiss?
translation.zh: 是吗 诺亚 只是个吻吗？

translation.en: So I'll-- I'll see you around.
Keep up the good work, huh?
Holy crap! What am I going to tell Lee?
translation.zh: 糟糕 我怎么跟李尔说？

translation.en: Oh, hey. I'll be right back, okay? Oh! That was really close!
translation.zh: 我马上就回来 这次更接近了

translation.en: Yeah, the booth is crushing it!
translation.zh: 还好 那边人气很旺

translation.en: We have made more than all the other booths combined.
translation.zh: 我们收入大概是所有社团的总和

translation.en: And get this: I even wound up kissing your brother!
translation.zh: 还有 我刚才意外亲吻了你哥

translation.en: Come on, Lee. It's no big deal. Seriously.
translation.zh: 别这样 李尔 这不是啥大事

translation.en: Just don't end up grinding coochies with my brother,
or I'll literally never talk to you again.
That and Rule Number Nine, of course.
Come on, Lee. Seriously. As if.
translation.zh: 好了吧 李尔 当然

translation.en: I wondered if our kiss meant anything to Noah.
translation.zh:
我想 我们之间的吻
对诺亚是否有任何意义

translation.en: You know my mom will kill me if I leave you out here.
translation.zh: 把你扔在这里 我妈会杀了我的

translation.en: I couldn't stop thinking about the promise I had made to Lee.
translation.zh: 我忍不住想对李尔的承诺

translation.en: It's getting too dangerous. I'm pulling over.
translation.zh: 太危险了 我先靠边

translation.en: [Elle] But who knows if Noah even wanted to kiss me again.
translation.zh: 不知道诺亚想不想再吻我

translation.en: Because I still wanted to kiss him.
You know, if we wait out this rain, we should be fine.
translation.zh: 只要雨停 应该就没问题了

translation.en: I cannot just be another one of your conquests.
translation.zh: 我不能成为你又一个猎物

translation.en: Is that what you think of me?
It's what everyone thinks of you.
You want to know the truth?
You are the only girl who doesn't fall at my feet.
translation.zh:
你是唯一一个
对我没兴趣的女孩

translation.en: And it is driving me crazy.
It's one of the things I like about you.
translation.zh: 这只是我喜欢你的其中一个理由

translation.en: But you're not afraid to call me out on things.
And here I was thinking I was just your brother's annoying best friend.
translation.zh: 我觉得我只是你弟弟的密友

translation.en: [Noah] Look, I don't know what all this means.
I just like hanging out with you.
No, I think we'd better try again.
-[man] Security. -Oh, my God! We're gonna die!
I thought I told you not to bring girls around here anymore.
translation.zh: 我说过你不要再带女孩来这里

translation.en: You just took me to your hookup spot?
Still mad at you, but I am cold as shit!
translation.zh: 我仍然很生气 但我很冷

translation.en: And you are taking me home.
You know, I meant when I said, Elle.
Why didn't Lee give you a ride home tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚怎么不是李尔送你？

translation.en: But that is the only reason
you're on the back of Noah Flynn's motorcycle, right?
translation.zh: 你才会坐诺亚摩托车的吧？

translation.en: In spite of what happened tonight,
I couldn't stop thinking about what Noah said to me.
translation.zh:
我仍然难以自控地
想起诺亚说的话

translation.en: And even though I know I shouldn't,
how much I wanted to believe him.
If you can't tell your best friend about something you're doing,
translation.zh: （回到家了吗？） 如果你不能跟密友分享你做的事情

translation.en: you probably shouldn't be doing it.
We never did get to finish your skinny dip at Flynn's party.
translation.zh:
弗林那个派对
后来我们都没能完成裸泳

translation.en: I was just way too drunk that night, so...

translation.zh: 不 不需要了 沃伦

translation.en: -Come on, Evans. It'll be nice. -No, Warren.
translation.zh:
-来吧 依云丝 会很舒服的
-不 沃伦

translation.en: -Evans, come on! Don't make me beg. -Warren?
translation.zh:
-依云丝 来吧 别扫兴
-沃伦

translation.en: -I'm not feeling well, Warren. -She said no, Warren!
translation.zh:
-我不想这样 沃伦
-她说了不要！

translation.en: It's all right. Can we-- Can you just take me home, please?
translation.zh: 没事 你能否送我回家？

translation.en: Okay. Just walk away. Hey, just walk away.
Hey, come on, man. It's all good.
translation.zh: 别这样 兄弟 我理解你

translation.en: I guess I'd also be pretty pissed if I was slumming it
translation.zh: 如果我捡了弟弟的旧鞋

translation.en: with my little brother's sloppy seconds.
Just get in the car, Elle.
Just get in the car, Elle.
What do you think? You think I meant to fall for my brother's best friend?
translation.zh: 你以为我想喜欢弟弟的好友吗？

translation.en: Wait, this isn't the way home.
I want to show you something.
How many girls have you made out with in this spot?
translation.zh: 你带了多少女的来这里？

translation.en: That sounds so great when you say it.
translation.zh: 你说出来的时候感觉很好

translation.en: I mean, what is the difference between what just happened...
translation.zh: 刚才发生的一切和以前的有何区别…

translation.en: Here's how this is gonna work.
No more telling me what to do.
If we do this, nobody can know.
translation.zh: 如果真的要开始 不能让其他人知道

translation.en: I figure out a way to tell Lee. It has to be that way.
translation.zh: 让我想想怎么跟李尔说

translation.en: You know, you're cute when you're bossy.
translation.zh: 你发号施令的时候很可爱

translation.en: You know, we don't have to.
[Elle] You know when the time is right.
Noah and his stupid, sexy smirk got the best of me.
And I was happy about it.
But now what am I going to do?
This is all your fault, kissing booth!
We're supposed to be in a logistics meeting right now. Okay?
We're trying to figure out how not to get caught.
I don't see what the big deal is.
It's not like anyone's gonna think that I have a girlfriend.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都认为我有女友

translation.en: Oh, yeah, God forbid anyone actually thinks you're in a relationship.
translation.zh:
大家都不认为
你会维持长久关系

translation.en: Hey! I have my reputation to think of.
-Just a minute. -[Mrs. Flynn] I need to get your laundry.
Go, go down there. Yeah! Just one second, Mom!
You know, I could have brought the laundry down.
It's okay. I have an hour to kill before your dad and I will meet the Andersons.
translation.zh:
在和安德逊他们出去之前
我还有1小时时间

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, don't forget.
We're going out on Saturday to celebrate your big news.
translation.zh: 周末我们出去庆祝你的大事

translation.en: -We don't have to, Mom. -Of course, we do.
It's not every day you get accepted to an Ivy League school.
translation.zh: 你以为那么容易被常春藤盟校录取

translation.en: Oh! And I invited the Evanses.
She kind of has a crush on you.
Of course you didn't. Boys never do.
translation.zh:
你当然不知道
男孩都迟钝

translation.en: She's not even supposed to be here.
I have to be downstairs in ten minutes and work on the prom banner with Lee.
translation.zh:
10分钟后我要下楼
和李尔一起做舞会横幅

translation.en: I don't even know if I'm gonna go or not yet.
Listen, you can't tell anybody about this, okay?
[Elle] And that was the first time it hit me.
translation.zh: 这是第一次我认清现实

translation.en: Noah would be leaving for college. Soon.
But we need to get you out of here, and lucky for you,
translation.zh: 当务之急是你要离开这里

translation.en: I've got your escape route all figured out.
translation.zh: 我已经帮你想好了方法

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me.
Or we could just go tell Lee now.
translation.zh: 或者我们可以去跟李尔说出真相

translation.en: Are you still wearing your clothes?
Oh. Okay. I'll be down in a second.
[Lee] Oh, hey, I think you got a text from someone.
-I'll see who it is. -That's okay. I got it.
translation.zh:
-我看看是谁
-不用了 我来

translation.en: Lee, I said I'll get it.
Why, is it from a boy?
Since when do you have a lock on your phone?
Um... little bro keeps getting into it.
♪ But love grows where my rosemary goes ♪
Put your foot over the bike.
-Can I watch? -Do you want to wait for me downstairs?
translation.zh:
-我也能看吗？
-你介意在楼下等我吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Thank you. I'll be there in a second.
Stink bomb? Are you kidding me? Where did you even learn that?
translation.zh:
臭弹？真的吗？
你哪里学会的？

translation.en: I just thought it was gonna make a little bit of fog.
translation.zh: 我以为只会导致一点点的烟雾

translation.en: Hey, this is great. I really needed this.
translation.zh: 这很棒 我正需要这个

translation.en: Yeah, we really haven't been hanging out much, right?
translation.zh: 我们最近好像没一起玩了

translation.en: You've been, like, acting really weird recently.
Is this because you don't have a date to prom?
translation.zh: 是不是因为你找不到人去舞会？

translation.en: Because if that's it, you can come with Rachel and I.
translation.zh: 如果是这样 你可以加入我和瑞秋

translation.en: [Elle] Stop lying to your best friend. It's time.
translation.zh: 别再隐瞒好友了 是时候说出真相

translation.en: Lee, there is something I wanted to tell you.
translation.zh: 李尔 我有话想对你说

-嘿 你们好
-嘿 你来啦

translation.en: So, it's okay if Elle comes to prom with us, right?
translation.zh: 你觉得艾莉和我们一起去舞会如何？

translation.en: So, what was it you were saying?

translation.zh: 就是舞会的事 所以…

translation.en: I swear to God. Says it right here.
Hey, could you pass me the wrench, please?
translation.zh: 你能不能把扳手递给我？

translation.en: The little black tool box on top of the shelf.
translation.zh: 就在架子顶上那个黑色工具箱

translation.en: When'd you become such a doctor?
translation.zh: 你哪里获得医生技能的？

translation.en: Since I started getting into fights.
You kind of learn to take care of yourself when that happens.
translation.zh: 必须学会怎样照顾好自己

translation.en: Why do you get in all those fights anyway?
I guess it's kind of just how I'm wired.
My parents even sent me to see a couple of counselors.
translation.zh: 我父母带我去看过一些咨询师

translation.en: But you know, we're all fucked up one way or another, right?
translation.zh: 但我们或多或少都有点问题

translation.en: I don't think there's much you can't do.
[Lee] Hey, Noah, have you seen Elle?
translation.zh: 诺亚 你看到艾莉吗？
老天 你的脸怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, I had an accident and Noah offered to help.
translation.zh: 发生了点意外 诺亚在帮忙

translation.en: -Did you do that to her? -What did you just say?
I said did you do that to her? Did you hit Elle?
translation.zh: 我说你是不是打艾莉了？

translation.en: -You really think I'd hit her? -I wouldn't put it past you.
translation.zh:
-你真的这样想？
-当然不排除这种可能
嘿 不是 李尔 我很好

translation.en: I just tripped in the garage.
You really expect me to believe that she just tripped?
-Get a clue, Lee! You weren't even here! -I swear to God,
translation.zh:
-你清醒点 李尔 你都不在现场
-我发誓…

translation.en: -if you laid a hand on her.... -All right, that's it!
Look at me. Noah, look at me!
translation.zh: 看着我 诺亚 看着我

translation.en: Is there something going on between you two?
translation.zh: 你们2个是不是有点什么？

translation.en: But I really need to get out of here.
Do you want to go downstairs and start the car?
I just need to grab my things.
Look, I have to tell him tonight.
That way I can take you to prom.
translation.zh: 那我就可以带你去舞会
等等 李尔 等等
等等 诺亚 留在这里

translation.en: So this is what you've been keeping from me?
You were never meant to find out this way.
Seems I was never meant to find out at all, doesn't it?
Hey, lay off her, Lee. It's not like it's all Elle's fault.
translation.zh: 嘿 李尔 这不是她的错

translation.en: You! Don't even get me started on you, okay?
Telling other guys to stay away from Elle to protect her.
translation.zh: 让别的男孩不要靠近来保护她

translation.en: And there you are, treating her like some slut that you picked up at the club.
translation.zh:
然后你对她的所为
就像在外面勾搭其他女人

translation.en: You have no idea what you're talking about.
So you're trying to tell me that you two have not slept together.
translation.zh:
你是不是想说
你们还没搞在一起

translation.en: So you really just have been fucking my brother and lying to me.
translation.zh:
你一直跟我哥有一腿
然后还欺骗我

translation.en: No, it's not enough. She has no clue what she's gotten herself into with you!
translation.zh: 不够 她不知道你是什么人

translation.en: This is bullshit. You're acting like a hurt, little bitch.
translation.zh: 你放屁 你就像个受伤的可怜虫

translation.en: That is enough! Calm down! I'm not letting you go until you chill out!
translation.zh:
够了 冷静点
你不冷静我是不会放手的

translation.en: Please, Lee, don't leave like this.
translation.zh: 李尔 你别这样走掉

translation.en: So much for Rule Number Nine, huh?
I didn't mean for this to happen.
Noah has gotten everything that he has ever wanted.
translation.zh: 诺亚都可以得到他想要的

translation.en: The only thing that I had that he didn't....
And now he has that too.
Look, it's okay. He'll get over it.
Why? Why did you come downstairs?
I told you to stay inside!
Like you wanted to make things worse!
You can not pin all this on me.
[Elle] Some people say you'll fall in love.
translation.zh: 有些人说你会坠入爱河

translation.en: And that's the person you'll spend forever with.
translation.zh: 就是这个人 你会相伴终老

translation.en: They'll be the one who, no matter what, you can't live without.
translation.zh: 这个人 是你的唯一

translation.en: all I cared about was Lee.
And I was pretty sure I'd lost him forever.
translation.zh: 我肯定我永远失去了他

translation.en: There's someone here to see you.
I was hoping maybe we could talk.
There's really nothing to talk about.
I'm just really sorry for lying to Lee about Noah and...
translation.zh:
我很抱歉为了诺亚的事
对李尔撒谎

translation.en: Elle, I was friends with your mom for over 20 years.
translation.zh: 艾莉 我是你妈20年的闺蜜

translation.en: She was my best, best friend.
But if you think that we didn't fight sometimes,
translation.zh: 但如果你以为我们没争吵过

translation.en: But you know, I can't really remember what a single fight was really about.
translation.zh: 但我想不起具体吵架的事

translation.en: is that we always forgave each other.
It doesn't really feel like that right now.
You're lucky if you can get even one really good best friend in your life.
translation.zh:
一辈子有一个好友
都是很幸运的

translation.en: You just have to figure out how to make it right.
[Elle] I gotta admit, the next couple of weeks were pretty lonely.
translation.zh:
必须承认 接下来的几星期
我感觉很孤单

translation.en: His attendance at school got so bad,
he was in danger of not graduating.
At least Dad had forgiven me. He even paid for my driving lessons.
translation.zh:
（驾校培训） 至少父亲原谅了我
还资助我学车

translation.en: Decided it was about time I got my license.
Then one day it hit me.
No matter how mad you are at your best friend,
you have to forgive them if they give you ice cream.
translation.zh: 如果她给你买雪糕 你要原谅她

translation.en: I had to get away and think.
translation.zh: 我要离开然后认真想想

translation.en: I'm on my way home now.
I'm actually here to talk to you.
I shouldn't have let it happen.
But I'm not sorry that it did happen.
Or for the way that I feel about your daughter.
I can't say I support the two of you. I can't.
translation.zh: 我不能说我赞成你们的事

translation.en: But it's got to be Elle's choice.
translation.zh: 但这始终是艾莉的选择

translation.en: I just think that Elle is gonna have to figure out what's best for Elle.
translation.zh:
我想艾莉应该知道
什么是对的

translation.en: Hey... so I have been thinking about our birthday party after prom,
translation.zh: 舞会之后我们的生日派对

translation.en: and I was leaning towards like a costume party, maybe?
translation.zh: 或者我们搞个换装派对？

translation.en: Any excuse to cross-dress and I'm in!
translation.zh: 只要有机会搞怪 我肯定参加

translation.en: You have fun tonight. Okay, Ellie-bear?
translation.zh: 你今晚玩得开心 亲爱的

translation.en: Kind of makes you a little less annoying.
Hello, Los Angeles Country Day Prom!
translation.zh: 各位 洛杉矶国家学校舞会！

translation.en: Now, I'd like to introduce this year's theme:
Photographs which show images of great moments
translation.zh: 照片让我们的回忆变得清晰

translation.en: and helped to define who we are as a class.
It's a final look back on who we were,
at the very moment that we're looking forward to who we want to become.
translation.zh: 进而找到自己前行的目标

translation.en: [British Beauty] So, for everyone out there,
let's make this prom the very best!
translation.zh: 让我们享受今晚的舞会
谁拍的？真漂亮 （沃伦家海滩派对）

translation.en: [Elle] It was at this exact moment that I finally felt okay.
translation.zh: 此次此刻我终于平复心情

translation.en: I was a small part of something that mattered.
The kissing booth meant something to people.
translation.zh: 至少亲吻角落 对某些人意义非凡

translation.en: It was gonna be remembered by everybody.
I can't keep hurting people that I care about because of you.
translation.zh: 我不能因为你伤害其他爱我的人

translation.en: Okay? Nobody wants us to be together.
I just came to say I'm sorry about what happened on the lawn the other day.
translation.zh: 那天发生的事 对不起

translation.en: I never should have been lying to you.
But I wanted you to know that...
And I meant everything that I said to her tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚说的一切 也是认真的

translation.en: but I'm leaving for Boston tomorrow.
I figured I'd try to get settled in before the fall term. You know?
translation.zh: 我会尽快在那边安顿好

translation.en: Well, I'll see you around, eh?
[Lee] Rachel's getting here in ten minutes.
Is Noah gonna be here tonight?
He told me last night he was leaving for Harvard today.
translation.zh: 他昨晚说 他今天出发去哈佛

translation.en: He just didn't want to be around here.
But hey, it's for the best.
I mean, I think you did the right thing.
Only your best friend gets to know your birthday wishes.
translation.zh: 只有好友可以知道你的生日愿望

translation.en: want to be close to you.
doesn't give you the right to tell me who I can love.
translation.zh: 你不应该决定我可以爱谁

translation.en: What if I didn't like having her around? What would you do then?
translation.zh: 如果我不喜欢她 你怎么办？

translation.en: -I guess I'd break up with her. -No, you see?
You shouldn't have to do that just because I didn't want you to be with her.
This isn't the same thing as with Noah and you know that.
translation.zh: 这跟你和诺亚不是一回事

translation.en: We made up our rules when we were six.
translation.zh: 那些约定 是我们6岁时定的

translation.en: I'm saying that I love Noah.
And I'm sorry if that hurts you,
and I'm so sorry that I lied to you before.
But I'd be lying to you again if I didn't tell you that I love him
translation.zh:
但我错上加错
如果我不告诉你

translation.en: with every bit of my heart.
And if you just can't accept that,
Then maybe you can't be part of my life.
translation.zh: 可能你不能成为我生命的一部分

translation.en: I think you're making a big mistake.
Then that's my decision to make.
I love you, Elle, and I just want you to be happy.
translation.zh: 我爱你 我希望你幸福

translation.en: I have to find him. Like now.
It's okay. I'll help you find him, okay?
Okay, let me go just make sure my dad knows where I'm going, okay?
translation.zh: 我先走一步 你和我爸说一声

translation.en: Meet you outside in five, and you can drive the Stang.
translation.zh: 5分钟后外面见 你可以开车

translation.en: -Thank you. I love you so much! Thank you! -Go!
Thank you for doing this, by the way.
I think the hardest part was just seeing Noah's face at prom.
translation.zh: 最难的是在舞会看到诺亚

translation.en: Gosh, I wish I had just told him then.
translation.zh: 我真希望当时能告诉他

translation.en: But you know what? No matter
how he feels now, I've just gotta find him and tell him how I feel.
translation.zh:
我要找到他
然后告诉他我的想法

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Oh, Jesus, woman! Pull over!
Pull over! Pull the car over!
-My God! You're trying to kill us! -[Elle] Oh, my God!
translation.zh:
-我的天 你差点害死我们
-我的天
我的天 这怎么回事？

translation.en: I thought you were leaving for Harvard.
translation.zh: 我以为你出发去哈佛了

translation.en: Yeah, I was planning to, but...
I decided I had to see you one last time before I went.
translation.zh: 我决定走之前再见你一面

translation.en: And then Lee came upstairs and he told me everything.
translation.zh: 然后李尔在楼上跟我说了经过

translation.en: And the old switcheroo was his idea?
-It was like a classic Lee, huh? -Yeah!
He said something about Rule Number 18 or whatever.
Always be happy for your bestie's successes.
Thanks for staying a little longer.
Well, I had to see you blow out the candles on your cake.
I don't want to talk about that right now.
You know, I want to know what it was that you wanted to tell me.
[Elle] The next few weeks before Noah left for school
translation.zh: 接下来几星期 在诺亚离开前

translation.en: we spent every spare minute together...
up to the very last second.
Come on, Shelly. Don't say it like that.
translation.zh: 别这样 雪莉 别说这些

translation.en: I'll see you soon, and you can come and visit.
translation.zh: 我们很快会见面 你也可以过来

translation.en: -And we can make this work. -Okay, stop.
I just want to be with you for a few seconds more.
You are cute when you're being bossy!
translation.zh: 你发号施令的时候真可爱

translation.en: And don't turn back for a final wave.
That is way too cheesy and romantic.
[Elle] Maybe things really would work out with Noah.
translation.zh: 也许真的会和诺亚有好结果

translation.en: And no matter how much I wanted it,
things couldn't stay the way they were forever.
I knew there was a part of me
that was always going to belong to Noah Flynn.
A little piece of my heart
But it's funny when I think about it.

translation.zh: 有趣的是 所有的事情

translation.en: just because of a kissing booth.
Common-- A and B common mark.
translation.zh: 常用 A和B 常用符号

translation.en: So... sweet of you. I'm okay, though. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你太好了 我没事 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, wait! Flynn wears Superman boxers?
translation.zh: 等等 弗林穿着超人短裤吗？
看 你脸红了 多可爱

translation.en: First of all, if you mention this to anyone, and I mean anyone...
translation.zh: 如果你跟其他人说 我指任何人…

translation.en: I save you, and now you're trying to blackmail me.
translation.zh: 我救了你 你还威胁我

translation.en: Sounds so tawdry when you put it that way, but yes, definitely.
translation.zh: 你这样说就太俗了 虽然是事实

translation.en: Boom! I got you! In your face!
Are you crazy, Dad? I love it!
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？爸 当然喜欢

translation.en: Good, now you can take Mr. Stinks-a-lot to baseball practice.
translation.zh:
好的 以后你负责送臭球
去棒球训练

translation.en: Hey, I don't stink that bad!
Do you think you could maybe get a ride home with somebody else?
I think she might even let me play with her boobies later.
translation.zh:
我想今晚会有机会
她肯让我摸咪咪

translation.en: You're picking boobies over my awesomeness?
Boobies. My answer is always gonna be boobies.
translation.zh: 咪咪 这比你更有吸引力

translation.en: I'm just not really sure if I like that one more or that one.
translation.zh: 我只是不确定哪一个好点

translation.en: [Lee] So appealing in their own way. Don't you think?
translation.zh: 太震撼了 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Oh, God! I can't look any more.
translation.zh: 我的天 我不能直视

translation.en: I know what room you're in, Vince!
translation.zh: 我知道你在哪里 云斯
野兽模式 准备好了吗？
